Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1977...
Had first career hit on 9/20/1977, off Ronald Maness (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1978, off Curtis French (SHP)...
Traded from Plum Grove to Capital City on 7/16/1982 (Going to PG: 2B H. Cooper, 1B S. Knuth. Going to CC: SS J. Cotton)...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/12/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $2,555,555 per year...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Coney Island on 5/11/1984...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 7/11/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/19/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $1,883,000 per year...
